CustomField.description: A semi-colon delimited list of User emails to skip during processing. Triggers for specified SObjects or trigger handlers will not fire when invoked by Users with these emails (i.e. mat.ruff@builtin.com;michael.engler@builtin.com)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A semi-colon delimited list of User emails to skip during processing. Triggers for specified SObjects or trigger handlers will not fire when invoked by Users with these emails (i.e. mat.ruff@builtin.com;michael.engler@builtin.com)
CustomField.label: User Emails to Skip
